bill.summary:
Reducing COVID-19 Disparities by Investing in Public Health Act
This bill provides additional funding for FY2021 and subsequent fiscal years to specified components of the Department of Health and Human Services, including the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, the National Institute on Minority Health and Disparities, and the Office of Minority Health.
